member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoDropDownList`2.OpenAnimationWaitingOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting options of open animation. Uses as default value.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoDropDownList`2.CloseAnimationWaitingOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting options of close animation. Uses as default value.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoMultiSelect`1.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Gets the instance for the value indicating whether the control is read-only. By default checks "readonly" attribute of nested input element. Override method to change the behavior.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoPopup`1.DefaultAnimationWaitingOptions
member.summary: Gets the default animation waiting options. Timeout is 5 seconds. Interval is 0.1 seconds.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoSwitch`1.IsChecked
member.summary: Gets the instance of the checked state value.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoSwitch`1.Should
member.summary: Gets the verification provider that gives a set of verification extension methods.

member.name: M:Atata.KendoUI.KendoSwitch`1.Check
member.summary: Checks the control. Also executes and triggers.

member.name: M:Atata.KendoUI.KendoSwitch`1.Uncheck
member.summary: Unchecks the control. Also executes and triggers.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoTreeViewItem`2.DefaultAnimationWaitingOptions
member.summary: Gets the default animation waiting options. Timeout is 5 seconds. Interval is 0.1 seconds.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoTreeViewItem`2.ExpandAnimationWaitingOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting options of expand animation. Uses as default value.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoTreeViewItem`2.CollapseAnimationWaitingOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the waiting options of collapse animation. Uses as default value.

member.name: P:Atata.KendoUI.KendoTreeViewItem`2.Text
member.summary: Gets the text control. Finds control by "k-in" class. More specific/deep path to find text element can be set via applied to custom class inherited from , for example: [ValueXPath("/span[1]/strong")]. Format can be applied using [Format("CUSTOM{0}FORMAT", TargetName = nameof(Text))] attribute applied to custom inherited class. It is also possible to override method to add/replace specific attributes.
